cause.description:
aplace for ppl to get heard... to help ppl in need of getting heard if you guys really do send money thats kool cuz i would like to start up a radio show so i can play bands from a round the maritimes... peace p.s all money will go towards this ... thanks ... kayla
p.p.s help out by telling friends...
1. help get heard...
cause.mission: to get every good band in the maritimes heard...
cause.name: help ... localbands get heard
